text:
Haha, well, it's understandable, Mikoto. Because you're
so dedicated to facing the stage with all your heart.

But you know... I hope you won't forget to cherish
the excitement of the moment and enjoy yourself.

For example, when you put on your costume,
you naturally start to feel excited and nervous, right?

You can imagine what it will feel like to
stand on stage on the day of the performance...

There are lots of those kinds of nervous
and excited feelings packed into each stage.

Even during the preparation period, it's the same. It's a
waste to just make a serious face during practice, you know?
